content: Am I reading the logs wrong, or is CI hanging unexpectedly? https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/pull/7118/checks?check_run_id=2375062027
I think IME usually that's a runner somehow transiently getting stuck (i.e. not your fault). Unless it's happening on other PRs probably would cancel the job and re-run it.
The updates from GitHub actions sometimes get stuck while the job still runs in the background.
Yeah, when I've seen this before it's just github failing to indicate that it's progressed to the next stage
it's ticking along nicely now, by the looks of things
